Small pile of twenty mace spheres for the [[Classes:Mace|firemace]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR MaceAmmo : {{Class|Ammo}} { {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_AMMOMACE1" {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 20 {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 150 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackAmount}} 20 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount}} 300 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "INAMLOB" States { Spawn: AMM1 A -1 Stop } }
